high_descs: Take a step to your left and then walk to the counter that is in front of you
Pick up the spoon that is on the counter
Turn to the right and walk to the sink
Place the spoon into the spoon
anns.task_desc: Place a spoon into a sink

high_descs: Walk forward and to the left slightly.
Pick up the spoon to the left of the sink.
Move to the right to stand at the sink.
Put the spoon in the sink.
anns.task_desc: Put the spoon in the sink.

high_descs: Move to the right of the sink at the counter.
Pick up the spoon on the counter.
Turn right, move to the sink, turn left to face the sink.
Put the spoon in the sink.
anns.task_desc: Put a spoon in the sink.
